location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushere [Bushire], to Peter Elwin Wrench, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: *The letter is dated 26 January 1764, but it is almost certain that this is a mistake and should be 1765.The letter reports the arrival of a caravan at Bushire and the demand for more variety of woollens.
